HIPAIR: Interactive Mechanism Analysis and Design Using Configuration Spaces. In Proceedings of the National Conference on Artificial Intelligence, 1994.<P> L. Joskowicz, E. P. Sacks, and V. Srinivasan. Kinematic Tolerance Analysis. In Third Symposium on Solid Modeling and Applications, 1995.<P> E. P. Sacks. A Review of Qualitative Reasoning. AI Magazine, 16, 1995.<P> E. P. Sacks and L. Joskowicz. Computational Kinematic Analysis of Higher Pairs With Multiple Contacts. Journal of Mechanical Design, 117:269-277, 1995.<P> E. P. Sacks and L. Joskowicz. HIPAIR: Interactive Mechanism Analysis and Design Using Configuration Spaces. In Proceedings of the 11th Annual Symposium on Computational Geometry: 4th Annual Video Review of Computational Geometry, Vancouver, B.C., 1995.<P> E. P. Sacks and L. Joskowicz. Mechanism Design and Analysis Using Configuration Spaces. In Proceedings of the Ninth World Congress on the Theory of Machines and Mechanisms, 1995.<P> K. Yip, F. Zhao, and E. P. Sacks. Imagistic Reasoning.
